Stuxnet virus also infected Chevron's IT network Mohit Kumar
Stuxnet, a sophisticated computer virus created by the United States and Israel, to spy on and attack Iran’s nuclear enrichment facilities in Natanz also infected Chevron ’s network in 2010, immediately after it spread into the wild.
